pwyw.title: "Within Capacity" Model
pwyw.description: Our advisory and methodology services follow a flexible, capacity-based pricing model. Instead of a fixed fee, we provide clear reference prices that teams can adjust according to their real ability to contribute. This keeps our work accessible for early-stage projects while ensuring sustainability and fairness for everyone involved.
